channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Best Turkish Kebab Litter all over Walford Road again, 28th September
item.description:
Best Turkish Kebab empty containers and half eaten food strewn across Walford Road once again. Please please may we take action, this will attract rats

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge mound / slope in pavement, 28th September
item.description:

item.title: Antisocial behaviour weekend party goes. Leaving bar with alcoholic drinks dumping them in surrounding areas on public streets with alcoholic drinks leaving them on communal grass areas., 28th September
item.description:
Antisocial behaviour weekend partygoers pubs and bars drinking alcohol and public streets. Community support officers need to patrol weekends.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Osborne Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Antisocial behaviour weekend party goes. Leaving bar with alcoholic drinks dumping them in surrounding areas on public streets with alcoholic drinks leaving them on communal grass areas., 28th September
item.description:
Antisocial behaviour pubs and bars in the Hackney Wick causing nuisance to residents. Weekend community support officers need to be assigned.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Osborne Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree and eroded boundary hedging, 28th September
item.description:
A boundary tree fell in the storm over a year ago! Also the boundary hedge, giving residents vital protection from traffic pollution and privacy, is eroded and getting worse in many places. This is affecting all residents at houses 1515- 1525. Please replace!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Cambridge Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black Sidcup litter bin is full to overflowing in Nelson Road near Udens and the approach to Morrisons., 28th September
item.description:
The Black litter bin near Udens/ Morrisons footpath approach in Nelson Road, Sidcup (off the High Street near Boots) is full and spilling out over the floor and has been for several days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nelson Road, Longlands, London

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 28th September
item.description:
Vehicle has been parked in same position for over a year (notice the weeds growing by kerb along entire length of Van) Van is being used as storage for unknown items. MOT has now expired (27/09) This vehicle is a complete eyesore and is bringing down the overall appearance of what was once upon a time a very nice neighbourhood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moordown, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
